title: From the heart of America
creator_credit: James Woolley, Kenneth Baldwin and United States Information Agency
brief_description: The memorial services for the late President Eisenhower following his death in March 1969. Shows the funeral caisson moving along Constitution Avenue, the services in the Rotunda and the Washington national Cathedral and the funeral train heading west to Abilene, Kansas. Excerpts from President Nixon’s eulogy are heard.
